labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bilibili.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2F) ### Comment > 为什么uBlock Origin Lite能拦截，adguard不能拦截，而且我看到另一个使用它的用户，能做到已拦截。拦截的东西是叫流媒体分流 ### Screenshots

issue.body:
